products.name: Elite Pro Match Ball
products.description: Official match ball used in professional leagues. FIFA Quality Pro certified with premium materials for optimal flight, touch, and durability. Features a seamless surface and balanced panels for predictable trajectory.

products.name: Strike Team Home Jersey
products.description: Official home jersey with moisture-wicking technology to keep you dry on the pitch. Made with recycled polyester and featuring team colors and emblem. This authentic jersey is identical to what the pros wear on matchday.

products.name: Speed Phantom Pro Cleats
products.description: Lightweight speed boots designed for forwards and wingers. Features a textured upper for superior ball control and a specially designed stud configuration for explosive acceleration. Worn by top professionals worldwide.

products.name: Goalkeeper Elite Gloves
products.description: Professional goalkeeper gloves with 4mm Contact latex palm for superior grip in all weather conditions. Features a flexible cut for optimal finger movement and cushioning to protect against powerful shots.

products.name: Training Strike Away Jersey
products.description: Official away jersey with breathable fabric to keep you comfortable during intense training sessions. Features the team's away colors and badge, made with sustainable materials and modern fit.

products.name: Control Master Pro Cleats
products.description: Midfield maestro boots designed for players who control the game. Features a premium leather upper for exceptional touch and a comfort-focused design for players who are constantly on the move throughout the match.

products.name: Training Practice Ball
products.description: Durable training ball for daily practice sessions. Designed to maintain shape and air pressure through extensive use. Perfect for academies, clubs, and individual training.

products.name: Performance Training Shorts
products.description: Lightweight, breathable shorts perfect for training and matches. Features moisture-wicking fabric and an ergonomic fit to enhance movement and comfort during play.

products.name: Captain's Armband
products.description: Official captain's armband made from elastic material for comfort. Available in multiple colors with adjustable fit for all sizes.

products.name: Third Kit Special Edition Jersey
products.description: Limited edition third kit jersey with unique design inspired by club heritage. Features premium fabric, club crest, and special commemorative details celebrating team history.

products.name: Defender Pro Shin Guards
products.description: Professional-grade shin guards providing maximum protection without sacrificing mobility. Featuring a hard outer shell and cushioned inner lining for comfort during matches.

products.name: Backpack Pro Team Edition
products.description: Spacious backpack with dedicated compartments for shoes, water bottles, and personal items. Features team colors and emblem, perfect for training days and travel.
